member.name: IMFSensorProfile.AddBlockedControl
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Adds a profile filter to the specified media stream.
member.param: The ID of the stream to add to.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfile.IsMediaTypeSupported
member.summary: Determines if a media stream supports the specified media type.
member.param: The ID of the stream to check.
Pointer to an describing the media type to check.
Returns true if the media type is supported; otherwise, false.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorProfile
member.summary: Describes a media foundation sensor profile.
